channel.title: Wow wtf?
channel.description:
so i finished coding my server and everything is good and then i send my client out to my freind and when he tries to log in it says "error connecting to server" and im really annoyed.... i changed the ip in client.java (client sided) and he has hamachi up and running and i can log in no problems... im pretty sure u dont need to change anything in the source. but yeah ive got no clue why my freaking server isnt working.. :mad: :mad: :( :( :confused: :confused:
also this is project insanity base...

item.title: Wow wtf?
item.dc:creator: @klub5tep klub5tep
item.description:
@klub5tep wrote:

Do you have a linksys modem? if you do i can do detailed step-by-step instructions of portforwarding. i send you all the links you need i have all the programs and everything so there is no virus. i know that for a fact. and it hardly takes up any memory on your hard drive if that is something your worried about.

Read full topic

item.title: Wow wtf?
item.dc:creator: @i_make_webclients_fo i make webclients for you
item.description:
@i_make_webclients_fo wrote:

When you portforawd with utorrent you have to put the rite port in to utorrent then save it close utorrent fully run your server wait untill its all loaded and then open utorrent and it will connect and I used to use no-ip was good but the ip can flood so go to your brouser and type in www.ipchicken.nt and use the ip it gives you and you won’t have a problem hope this helps you

Read full topic
